attributes.action: change the points system in the FA Premiership.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Awarding 4 points instead of 3 to those who spend less than £20 million on players per season. Then award those who waste money on rubbish like Shevchenko, Ballack, Veron and Djemba-Djemba with 2 points for a win.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
